If you want to avoid downloading images you can just use the 
org.archive.c=
rawler.filter.FilePatternFilter and REJECT on Images.

All you have to do, =
when you configure the job, is to add the filter in 
the submodules section=
 (in decide rules) and then go to settings and 
choose the correct values.
=

You can go over chapter 6 of the user manual to get more details.

Joey


=
